content: <?xml version='1.0' encoding="ISO-8859-1" ?> <WFS_Capabilities     version="1.0.0"     updateSequence="0"     xmlns="http://www.opengis.net/wfs"     xmlns:ogc="http://www.opengis.net/ogc"     xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"    xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.opengis.net/wfs http://schemas.opengis.net/wfs/1.0.0/WFS-capabilities.xsd">  <!-- MapServer version 6.4.0 OUTPUT=GIF OUTPUT=PNG OUTPUT=JPEG OUTPUT=KML SUPPORTS=PROJ SUPPORTS=GD SUPPORTS=AGG SUPPORTS=FREETYPE SUPPORTS=CAIRO SUPPORTS=ICONV SUPPORTS=WMS_SERVER SUPPORTS=WMS_CLIENT SUPPORTS=WFS_SERVER SUPPORTS=WCS_SERVER SUPPORTS=GEOS INPUT=JPEG INPUT=POSTGIS INPUT=OGR INPUT=GDAL INPUT=SHAPEFILE -->  <Service>   <Name>MapServer WFS</Name>   <Title>World_Copper_Smelters</Title>   <Abstract>Locations and characteristics of the copper smelters throughout the world.</Abstract>   <Keywords>     copper; natural resource extraction; mineral resources   </Keywords>   <OnlineResource>http://mrdata.usgs.gov/</OnlineResource>   <Fees>none</Fees>   <AccessConstraints>none</AccessConstraints> </Service>  <Capability>   <Request>     <GetCapabilities>       <DCPType>         <HTTP>           <Get onlineResource="http://mrdata.usgs.gov/wfs/copper-smelters?" />         </HTTP>       </DCPType>       <DCPType>         <HTTP>           <Post onlineResource="http://mrdata.usgs.gov/wfs/copper-smelters?" />         </HTTP>       </DCPType>     </GetCapabilities>     <DescribeFeatureType>       <SchemaDescriptionLanguage>         <XMLSCHEMA/>       </SchemaDescriptionLanguage>       <DCPType>         <HTTP>           <Get onlineResource="http://mrdata.usgs.gov/wfs/copper-smelters?" />         </HTTP>       </DCPType>       <DCPType>         <HTTP>           <Post onlineResource="http://mrdata.usgs.gov/wfs/copper-smelters?" />         </HTTP>       </DCPType>     </DescribeFeatureType>     <GetFeature>       <ResultFormat>         <GML2/>       </ResultFormat>       <DCPType>         <HTTP>           <Get onlineResource="http://mrdata.usgs.gov/wfs/copper-smelters?" />         </HTTP>       </DCPType>       <DCPType>         <HTTP>           <Post onlineResource="http://mrdata.usgs.gov/wfs/copper-smelters?" />         </HTTP>       </DCPType>     </GetFeature>   </Request> </Capability>  <FeatureTypeList>   <Operations>     <Query/>   </Operations>     <FeatureType>         <Name>cusmelters</Name>         <Title>cusmelters</Title>         <Abstract>Locations and characteristics of the copper smelters throughout the world.</Abstract>         <Keywords>           copper; natural resource extraction; mineral resources         </Keywords>         <SRS>EPSG:4326</SRS>         <LatLongBoundingBox minx="-112" miny="-35" maxx="151" maxy="70" />         <MetadataURL type="FGDC" format="text/xml">http://mrdata.usgs.gov/metadata/copper.xml</MetadataURL>     </FeatureType> </FeatureTypeList>  <ogc:Filter_Capabilities>   <ogc:Spatial_Capabilities>     <ogc:Spatial_Operators>       <ogc:Equals/>       <ogc:Disjoint/>       <ogc:Touches/>       <ogc:Within/>       <ogc:Overlaps/>       <ogc:Crosses/>       <ogc:Intersect/>       <ogc:Contains/>       <ogc:DWithin/>       <ogc:BBOX/>     </ogc:Spatial_Operators>   </ogc:Spatial_Capabilities>   <ogc:Scalar_Capabilities>     <ogc:Logical_Operators />     <ogc:Comparison_Operators>       <ogc:Simple_Comparisons />       <ogc:Like />       <ogc:Between />     </ogc:Comparison_Operators>   </ogc:Scalar_Capabilities> </ogc:Filter_Capabilities>  </WFS_Capabilities>
